<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can bound the aliasing properties of memset&#95;pattern16 just as we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for memcpy/memset.  This is particularly important because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopIdiomRecognizer likes to turn loops into calls to memset&#95;pattern16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whenever possible.</span></CodeLine>
